mapper.select: select u.userId as userId, u.userName, u.password, u.userSex, u.userImg, u.phoneNum, u.state, i.id as roleId, i.name FROM user u left join user_identity ui on u.userId = ui.user_id left join identity i on ui.identity_id = i.id where phoneNum = #{phoneNum} and u.state = 0
mapper.update: update user u set u.username=#{user.username}, u.age=#{user.age}, u.sex=#{user.sex}, u.signature=#{user.signature}, u.profile_photo=#{user.profilePhoto}, u.phone=#{user.phone}, u.email=#{user.email}, u.state=#{user.state}, u.sum_followed=#{user.sumFollowed}, u.sum_following =#{user.sumFollowing} where u.id = #{user.id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_identity(user_id, identity_id) values ((select u.userId as user_id from user u where u.phoneNum = #{userPhone}), (select i.id as identity_id from identity i where i.name='普通用户'))
